DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . The trial aim comparison effect glycaemic control liraglutide combination sulphonylurea agent ( SU ) compare SU monotherapy , assess HbA1c 24 week 52 week subject type 2 diabetes . Liraglutide compare placebo , combination SU . Trial randomisation period 24 week follow 28 week extension period , total 52 week .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Liraglutide Combination With Sulfonylurea ( SU ) Blood Glucose Control Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Diet/exercise therapy sulfonylurea ( SU ) least eight week HbA1c great equal 7.0 % le 10.0 % BMI le 35 kg/m2 Treatment insulin within last 12 week Treatment drug could interfere glucose level Any serious medical condition Females pregnant , intention become pregnant breastfeeding
